title: Capsid
question: What is Non-Fungible Rights ?
description:
Buy, sell and mint the rights to use NFTs,
including but not limited to collab, IP licensing, merch, and rental.

avatarGuidence.title: Avatar NFT guidance
desc: 1. Please choose your avatar NFT where the avatar occupies more than one quarter of the screen.

2. The final result will be determined by the digital costume in conjunction with the look and background of your avatar. It is recommended that you provide an avatar based on the style of the digital apparel, e.g. if the digital apparel is designed with necklaces and earrings, try to show the avatar with clear neck and ears in the image.

uploadImageGuidence.title: Image uploading guidance
desc: 1. Please upload images with a real person’s or an animal’s full body portrait, and please do not use images where the portrait occupies less than a quarter of the screen.

2. The final result will be determined by the digital costume in conjunction with the look and background of your image. It is recommended that you provide images based on the style of the digital apparel, e.g. if the digital apparel is designed with necklaces and earrings, try to show the wearer's neck and ears in the images.

3. If you want to show the same effect of digital clothing, please use pictures without excessive coloring, filters and retouching; if you choose pictures with a unique visual style, we will try our best to customize the clothing style to present the same visual style.
